About Me

I'm an Information Technology student passionate about software development, system management, and emerging technologies. My journey in IT has been focused on building practical solutions and continuously learning new technologies.

I specialize in frontend development with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My academic projects and hands-on experiences have equipped me with problem-solving abilities and adaptability in modern IT environments.

Professional Summary

Dedicated Information Technology student with a strong passion for creating innovative software solutions. Experienced in frontend development, system management, and modern web technologies. Skilled in building responsive web applications, managing IT systems, and implementing best practices in software development.

Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and various web frameworks. Strong problem-solving abilities and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code. Always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to meaningful projects.

Projects

A collection of my projects showcasing technical skills, creativity, and problem-solving abilities.

Classroom Management System

Classroom management is the practice of creating a structured, respectful, and engaging learning environment by setting clear expectations, building routines, and minimizing disruptions so students can focus on learning.

Python Django Tailwind CSS MySQL
View Project →

Gate Management System

A Gate Management System (GMS) is a technology-driven solution designed to control, monitor, and automate access to gates in residential areas, schools, offices, or industrial facilities. It ensures security, efficiency, and convenience by regulating who enters or exits through a gate.

node.js Laravel Tailwind CSS PHP Python MySQL
View Project →

System Monitoring Dashboard

IT system monitoring and management application with real-time metrics, alerting system, and comprehensive reporting. Helps track server performance and system health.

React Python Flask
View Project →
